about_the_game:
Dive into Crowd Diver, an asymmetrical social detective stealth multiplayer game where you can immerse yourself in the role of the Seeker, tasked with protecting the city from impending evil. Alternatively, you can become the Monster, seeking to wreak destruction and eliminate targets disguised.

FEATURES

Seeker
  • Bind-Rod
    The Bind Rod is a powerful weapon in Crowd Diver's armory. The Seeker use this weapon to capture monsters.
  • Security Consoles
    There are four consoles placed across the city. Activate them to reduce the targets visibility to the monster. Be cautious, as they can counter-hack the consoles!

Monster
  • Kill Mechanic
    Three targets are added for each monster that enters the game. They were highlighted through the map. Kill them when you are in distance!
  • Quick Change
    Change your appearance as quickly as possible when you think you've lost the Seeker with the Quick Change mechanic.

Environment
  • Interactive World
    Use doors and teleporter to move quickly to other parts of the map.
  • Futuristic Map
    The map presents itself as a unique environment in the futuristic style of Solarpunk. With its innovative design and captivating atmosphere, it offers players a visually impressive setting for their adventures.

ABOUT US

This game was created as part of a student project during our third semester at the School for Games in Hamburg, developed over a period of 10 weeks!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Runs on lowest settings at about 30 fps
